purpose: The email is a call for participation in the EASE'25 conference, scheduled for June 17-20, 2025. It invites researchers and practitioners to present and discuss their work on empirical evaluation in software engineering. The conference will feature keynotes from notable speakers and various tracks for research papers, including industry and doctoral tracks. Registration details are provided, along with information about workshops taking place on the first day of the conference.

conf_name_candidates.raw: EASE'25: 29th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering
conf_name_candidates.evidence: Call for Participation (Main Conference + Workshops): EASE'25: 29th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering, June 17-20, 2025

evidence_sentences: Call for Participation (Main Conference + Workshops): EASE'25: 29th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering, June 17-20, 2025.

The International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering (EASE) provides a stimulating forum where researchers and practitioners can present and discuss recent research results on a wide range of topics within empirical evaluation of software engineering technologies, practices, and tools.
EASE has three fantastic keynotes and a range of exciting research papers.
Conference registration can be accessed from the following link: https://conf.researchr.org/attending/ease-2025/registration.
On June 17th, EASE will feature the following five workshops.
